4473.title: The terms for this service are easy to read

tosdr.case: The terms for this service are easy to read

7287.quoteText:
Our anonymous, numbered accounts

We want you to remain anonymous. When you sign up for Mullvad, we do not ask for any personal information – no username, no password, no email address. Instead, a random account number is generated, a so-called numbered account. This number is the only identifier a person needs in order to use a Mullvad account
7287.title: The service allows you to use pseudonyms

7289.quoteText:
p>

Anyone at anytime can create as many numbered accounts as they wish on our website. An account can be used by multiple people or by someone other than the person who initially generated it.
7289.title: Users can access most of the pages on the service's website without revealing any personal information

tosdr.case: You can access most of the pages on the service's website without revealing any personal information

7290.quoteText:
What we don't log

We log nothing whatsoever that can be connected to a numbered account's activity:

  • no logging of traffic
  • no logging of DNS requests
  • no logging of connections, including when one is made, when it disconnects, for how long, or any kind of timestamp
  • no logging of IP addresses
  • no logging of user bandwidth
  • no logging of account activity except total simultaneous connections (explained below) and the payment information detailed in this post.
7290.title: This service does not track you

22323.quoteText: We do not keep activity logs of any kind.
22323.title: No VPN logs policy

tosdr.case: Only necessary logs are kept by the service to ensure quality

22324.quoteText: In those cases, we might process your personal data and the General Data Protection Regulation (“GDPR”) and other data protection laws may apply.
22324.title: The service claims to be GDPR compliant for European users

tosdr.case: The service claims to be GDPR compliant for European users

22325.quoteText: Mullvad accepts cash, Bitcoin, Bitcoin Cash, bank wire, credit card, PayPal, and Swish.
22325.title: An anonymous payment method is offered

tosdr.case: An anonymous payment method is offered

22327.title: An onion site accessible over Tor is provided

tosdr.case: An onion site accessible over Tor is provided

22328.quoteText: Any material changes to these terms will be notified via a prominent notice on mullvad.net/blog at least one month before the changes are applied.
22328.title: When the service wants to make a material change to its terms, you are notified at least 30 days in advance

tosdr.case: When the service wants to make a material change to its terms, you are notified at least 30 days in advance

22329.quoteText: To use the service, you need to use a Mullvad account number together with the Mullvad VPN app,
22329.title: You must create an account to use this service

tosdr.case: You must create an account to use this service

22330.quoteText: With a subscription, €5 is automatically deducted from your PayPal account each month.
22330.title: You authorise the service to charge a credit card supplied on re-occurring basis

tosdr.case: You authorise the service to charge a credit card supplied on re-occurring basis

22331.quoteText:
We offer users a 30-day money-back guarantee if you wish to withdraw from these terms or if you are not satisfied with our service.

The 30-day period starts when your payment is made. In the event of a withdrawal, you will be refunded and the expiration date of your account's VPN time will be adjusted to reflect the refunded time. If you wish to exercise your right to a refund, please read our refund guide at mullvad.net/help/refunds/.
22331.title: You are entitled to a refund if certain thresholds or standards are not met by the service

tosdr.case: You are entitled to a refund if certain thresholds or standards are not met by the service

22332.quoteText: Despite our best efforts, the service is provided on an “as is” and “as available” basis
22332.title: The service is provided 'as is' and to be used at your sole risk

tosdr.case: The service is provided 'as is' and to be used at your sole risk

22333.quoteText: we do not guarantee that the service will be available at all times
22333.title: The service provider makes no warranty regarding uninterrupted, timely, secure or error-free service

tosdr.case: The service provider makes no warranty regarding uninterrupted, timely, secure or error-free service

22334.quoteText: nor the accuracy of the service or any material provided by the service or on the Mullvad website.
22334.title: The service does not guarantee accuracy or reliability of the information provided

tosdr.case: The service does not guarantee accuracy or reliability of the information provided

22335.quoteText: The terms shall be construed in accordance with and governed by the substantive laws of Sweden.
22335.title: The court of law governing the terms is in a jurisdiction that is friendlier to user privacy protection (Sweden)

tosdr.case: The court of law governing the terms is in a jurisdiction that is friendlier to user privacy protection.
tosdr.tldr: Despite being part of the 14 eyes, Sweden Privacy laws are pretty strong.

22336.quoteText: Any dispute, controversy, or claim arising out of or in connection with the terms shall be handled by the National Board for Consumer Disputes (ARN) or the Swedish courts, with the city of Gothenburg's district court as the court of first instance.
22336.title: You aren’t forced into binding arbitration in case of disputes

tosdr.case: You aren’t forced into binding arbitration in case of disputes

22337.quoteText:
All the cookies we use

Yes, this is all of them!
22337.title: A list of all cookies set by the website is provided

tosdr.case: A list of all cookies set by the website is provided

22375.quoteText: • No private information . not even your email address . will ever actively be passed to third parties (except the third party which operates our email service on behalf of us), unless you explicitly ask us to.
22375.title: This service gives your personal data to third parties involved in its operation

tosdr.case: This service gives your personal data to third parties involved in its operation
